E-Mail Messages
Date: Friday, 1/31/1983
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Clu Haywood



Date: Monday, 2/3/1983
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
1B Anton Rosario, SP James Mosca
in return for
CF Fritz Kelley.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
New Jersey GM



Date: Saturday, 2/15/1983
Subject: Thank you, I'll sign!
Your contract offer is really what I'm looking for.
I'm looking forward to playing with Lynchburg!

Regards,
Clu Haywood

Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Progress of Lucas Pascale
Dear Sir,
Lucas Pascale has nothing more to prove at AA Springfield Duff!
He has an AVG of .366 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
